subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Crown Prince Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa of Bahrain called off Formula One’s season-opening race Monday, handing another victory to those protesting the ruling dynasty’s stranglehold on power.
snippet: Crown Prince Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa of Bahrain called off Formula One’s season-opening race Monday, handing another victory to those protesting the ruling dynasty’s stranglehold on power.
